name: iOS液态玻璃Pro
description: 精细优化的iOS液态玻璃全局主题，去除粉色块并提升性能
author: ios-liquid-glass-dev

code.js: (() => { const m = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)'); const apply = e => document.body.classList.toggle('glass-dark', e.matches); apply(m); m.addEventListener('change', apply); console.log('iOS液态玻璃Pro主题已加载'); })();
